title: dot equals vs equals equals alpha beta delta

content.question: String alpha = new String("APCS");String beta = new String("APCS");String delta = alpha;System.out.println(alpha.equals(beta));System.out.println(alpha == beta);System.out.println(alpha == delta);What is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
